Description: 2011 Gibson SG StandardHere is a genuine American made 2011 Gibson SG Standard! I'm not sure what the finish color is called, but it's a very dark red (maybe Wine Red). You can still see the wood grain through the finish. Actual weight is 6 lbs 11 oz.The body is in good condition overall and has some small dings, scratches and marks. This one was not a closet queen and has the typical wear and tear for a used guitar. No cracks, damage to the wood or structural issues.The neck is straight and the frets show only light wear. It's in excellent playing condition with no dead frets or other major issues. The fretboard is clean and the back of the neck has one small ding. The headstock has dings on the top corners and top edge. No cracks or repairs. The tuners have been changed to Klusons and I have not removed them, but there should not be any extra holes. The guitar had changed pickups when I got it, so I put in a set of the correct 490R and 498T's. The tailpiece has some worn areas from where the strings were wrapped around the top and the pickguard has a large worn spot. It comes with the original case which has some general wear on the outside. All of the latches, hinges and handle are in excellent working order and the interior has no bad odors.Please note that I do not set up my guitars before mailing. I have played it and everything is great as far as I'm concerned, but you may need to change the strings, adjust the action or do other maintenece to get it to your preferences. I list some of my items on both eBay and Reverb. In the event that this item sells on both marketplaces before I can take the other listing down, I will honor the first sale and refund the second. There will be no exceptions to this! SHIPPING & PAYMENT The shipping cost quoted in the shipping calculator is based on an estimated weight. It may actually be less when I processs the shipping label and I will refund any overcharge beyond postage and packaging costs. I only accept PayPal for my listings. Payment must be received within 10 Days after I send the invoice. I generally mail items within 2-3 days after payment. Please let me know if you have won some items and plan to bid on others so that I will wait to send the invoice. Local pickup is available. INTERNATIONAL BUYERSSorry, but international shipping is not available for this item
Title: 2011 Gibson SG Standard Dark Wine Red w/ Original Hardshell Case
